Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It is considered unlikely that etomidate will prove to be the hypnotic of choice for a totally intravenous anesthetic technique in adults because of the high incidence of myoclonia after prolonged administration .

1. Etomidate: It is a specific anesthetic drug mentioned in the paragraph.
2. Myoclonia: It is a medical condition characterized by involuntary and brief muscle jerks or twitches. In this context, it is mentioned as a side effect or complication of prolonged administration of etomidate. Therefore, it can be considered as a disease or condition.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.
